title: Smart Morning
detail: Start your mornings right with a smart mirror and coffee cup
extended_details:
Smart Mirror - displays important information and reminders for your day - such as weather, schedule,etc - on your own mirror!
Smart Coffee Mug - using RF technology, the LED's on a coffee mug will light up to notify you if your coffee is too hot or cold when you bring your hand near it!
